Install NVIDIA GeForce GT 710
====================
Download NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-470.256.02.run
Run NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-470.256.02.run



Install netplan
====================
sudo apt update && sudo apt install netplan.io
sudo vim /etc/netplan/xxxx.yaml
sudo netplan try && o netplan apply



Install fcitx5
====================
Set font size:
  fcitx5-configtool => addons(t) => UI => Classic User Interface => settings icon => Fonts:

themes:
  dracula
   https://github.com/drbbr/fcitx5-dracula-theme 
   vim ~/.config/fcitx5/conf/classicui.conf



Install MS Edge
====================
sudo apt install software-properties-common apt-transport-https wget
wget -q https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc && gpg -o /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/packages.edge.gpg --dearmor microsoft.asc
  # wget -q https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc -O- | sudo apt-key add -
sudo sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/edge stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/microsoft-edge.list'
sudo apt update
sudo apt install microsoft-edge-stable
  # 中文環境及 X11 via ssh, 詳見 lxc 檔案
start msedge microsoft-edge-stable  microsoft-edge-stable 1>/dev/null 2>/dev/null &
ln -s /path/to/new/cache/location $HOME/.config/microsoft-edge/Default/Cache
  # optional, 已有 $HOME/.cache/Microsoft 及 $HOME/.cache/microsoft-edge



apt certificate
====================
location
 /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/

import certificate
 sudo apt-key export xxxxx | sudo gpg --dearmour -o /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/xxxx.gpg



Remove old kernels
====================
sudo apt purge linux-image-x.x.x-xx-generic linux-headers-x.x.x-xx-generic
sudo rm -rv /lib/modules/x.x.x-xx-generic /boot/System.map-x.x.x-xx-generic
